title: Enchanting Emerald Chandbali - Pachala Jhumka
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish; Zambian Emeralds (Cabochon cut)
Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Gold weight approximately 18 grams.
features: Exquisite Chandbali design with intricate filigree work and delicate emerald dangles. Traditional paisley (manga malai) motifs are subtly incorporated into the lattice design. The secure lever-back closures ensure comfortable wear. Features a chandelier-like form that gently sways, adding to the overall elegance.
colors: complemented by the sparkling brilliance of white CZ stones.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranti or Diwali
and special celebrations such as seemantham
and formal gatherings. Equally stunning for evening wear
adding a touch of traditional glamour to modern attire.
description: This Chandbali Jhumka embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The vibrant Zambian Emeralds, known for their intense color and clarity, symbolize prosperity and good fortune. The timeless design ensures this piece will be cherished for generations, becoming a treasured heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish provides a lasting sheen, enhancing the beauty of the gold.
